top_prompts.title: Sweet Japanese-style girl at subway door
top_prompts.content: Generate an image of a Japanese-style beautiful girl standing at the subway door, sweet and charming.

top_prompts.title: Person relaxing on glowing cloud above the sky
top_prompts.content: The person from the reference photo (keep the face of the person 100% accurate to the reference image) is relaxing on a fluffy, glowing cloud high above the sky, surrounded by soft golden sunlight and vast layers of clouds stretching to the horizon. The person is lying back comfortably with a pillow, wearing a dark long‑sleeve shirt, olive green pants, and glasses, holding a book in one hand and a coffee cup in the other. The lighting is cinematic and warm, capturing the golden hour ambiance with radiant highlights and gentle shadows across the clouds. Captured with a wide‑angle lens at medium depth of field, it balances focus between the subject and the surrounding dreamy sky. The overall atmosphere is surreal and serene, blending realism with fantasy in a peaceful, imaginative setting.

top_prompts.title: Sydney Sweeney Ultra-Photorealistic Editorial Prompt
